<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages MIDI in -odac -iadc -d -M0 ;;;RT audio I/O with MIDI in </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 2
; Set MIDI channel 1 to play instr 1. massign 1, 1
instr 1
; Returns MIDI note number - an integer in range (0-127) iNum notnum
; Convert MIDI note number to Hz iHz = (440.0*exp(log(2.0)*((iNum)-69.0)/12.0))
; Generate audio by indexing a table; fixed amplitude. aosc oscil 10000, iHz, 1
; Since there is no enveloping, there will be clicks. outs aosc, aosc
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Generate a Sine-wave to be indexed at audio rate ; by the oscil opcode. f1 0 16384 10 1
; Keep the score "open" for 1 hour so that MIDI ; notes can allocate new note events, arbitrarily. f0 3600
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
